AssistantSid.description: The SID of the [Assistant](https://www.twilio.com/docs/autopilot/api/assistant) that is the parent of the resources to read.

Language.description: The [ISO language-country](https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E13214_01/wli/docs92/xref/xqisocodes.html) string that specifies the language used by the Query resources to read. For example: `en-US`.

ModelBuild.description: The SID or unique name of the [Model Build](https://www.twilio.com/docs/autopilot/api/model-build) to be queried.

Status.description: The status of the resources to read. Can be: `pending-review`, `reviewed`, or `discarded`

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
